name: fotoramamulti/fotorama-multi
title: Fotorama Elevation
description: Provide settings for the Fotorama-Elevation shortcode.

imgpath.label: Image Path
imgpath.help: Path to your images in the uploads folder.

showadress.label: Show Address
showadress.help: Show start adress of the tour

adresstext.label: Start Address Text
adresstext.help: Text for header above start address

requiregps.label: GPS-Data im Image required
requiregps.help: Show image only if it provides GPS-Data in its EXIF

showcaption.label: Show Caption
showcaption.help: Show the caption in the fotorama slider

shortcaption.label: Short Caption
shortcaption.help: Shorten Caption to first line only

maxwidth.label: Max Width of Container
maxwidth.help: Maximum width of the whole container with slider and map in px

minrowwidth.label: Minimum row width
minrowwidth.help: Minimum width of one row (slider or map) of the CSS-Grid in px

gpxfile.label: GPX-File
gpxfile.help: The GPX-file in your GPX-directory (see Admin Settings)

dload.label: Allow Download GPX-File
dload.help: Provide download link for the GPX-Track(s)

mapheight.label: Height of Map
mapheight.help: Height of the leaflet elevation map in px

chartheight.label: Height of Chart
chartheight.help: Height of the leaflet elevation chart in px
